name: Trackmania² Lagoon
description: Trackmania² Lagoon has you racing on raised tracks above a tropical island filled with insane activities. It comes with a FREE Trackmania multiplayer channel, an exclusive solo campaign, a new game mode and a world of possibilities in UGC.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or Windows 7 SP1 or Windows 8.1 or Windows 10 Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2 GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Video card must be 512 MB or more and should be a DirectX 10 - compatible or DirectX 11 – compatible DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
